answers.answer: I failed my 1 & 2 hour tests with my first pregnancy and then passed my 3 hour test.
I failed both but i had a bunch of friends that failed one and passed the other
I failed both & now i have gestational diabetes from my first & second pregnancy...
My first test was border line, and i passed the second one...
I passed both with my first I was very surprised that I did . I know many that have failed tho and passed it in acouple weeks
Tanks guys its just ****** avin to watch Wat I put in my mouth hope tis gestional diabietes leaves me after I deliver
Yes it will go away after pregnancy happen to me but now I'm pregnant again it did came ...but after of course u have to watch what u eat....
